Log-in Bandainamco id account in new window.
Make game show idols in home scene after login.
Touch back button at left-botton if nocide page shown like picture.
Touch back button of mobile or left arrow button at left-top to go setting window if idols show at home scene.
Touch \'Change live wallpaper\' button in setting window.
Touch \'Set wallpaper\' button in new window.
You can select where it show in home or both home and lock screen. Choose what you want.
After close setting window and go to launcher screen, Idols will show.
To hear bgm and communication with idols, turn on sound option at setting window.

In order to prevent accidentally pressing the menu button of Shinycolors when using the wallpaper, some areas are blocked from being touched. If something strange appears on the screen and you want to turn it off, please refer to the following.
If the idols are not displayed on the background screen as shown below, and notice window or event window of ShinyColors is displayed, use the reload or back function.
This is a function to refresh wallpaper. Click \'Reload\' button on settings window.

This is a function that presses the back button in the lower left part and the OK or Cancel button when a pop-up window appears. As described above, some of the screens are blocked from being touched, so various windows displayed on the screen can be removed with the back function. The refresh function takes time to reload, so it is usually convenient to use this function.
Alternatively, you can use the back function by quickly double-tapping an empty space on the wallpaper as shown in the photo below.
